text: @ScottImmordino Somebody get the lawsuits started. @KimReynoldsIA is out of her mind if she thinks people have to accept this very illegal decision. Protect your health, go on #strike. Refuse to be a #coronavirus guinea pig to feed Trump's fat, orange ego. #DefenseProductionAct #StayHome
